title: Himitsu no Heya no Kakushigoto
description: Satoru and Souma were classmates in the military training academy. Satoru always viewed Souma as a rival, but Souma never seemed to take him seriously. Now, after graduation, Souma is in the elite Spade Corps while Satoru is in the lesser Diamond Corps and it seems that Souma still isn't taking him seriously.
